File formatting works like:



*** SOLID SOLUTIONS ***

>> DesiredName		DatabaseName
NamePhaseSS1		NamePhaseSS2
NameInDB		NameInDB
NumOxygen		NumOxygen

>> OLIVINE	OLIVINEi 
FAYALITE	FORSTERITE
fayalite	forsterite
4		4



*** MINERAL DATA ***
DesiredName		DatabaseName		Oxygen
CLINOHUMITE		clinohumite		18
